Track.title: Track Your Prayers with Ease
Track.description: Keep a record of your daily prayers effortlessly and stay consistent in your ibadah.

Share.title: Share Your Progress with Friends
Share.description: Motivate others and yourself by sharing your prayer journey with your loved ones.

Remind.title: Never Miss a Prayer Again
Remind.description: Get timely notifications and reminders to ensure you never miss your Salah.

Journey.title: Check Your Prayer Journey
Journey.description: Reflect on your progress and see how far you've come in maintaining regular prayers.

Aware.title: Stay Aware of Your Last Prayer
Aware.description: Keep track of your last prayer and plan your day around your Salah schedule.

Pro.Title: Join Prayer Tracker +
Pro.Subtitle: Elevate Your Spiritual Journey
Pro.WelcomeMessage: Your support helps us spread khair (goodness) and assist the Ummah in strengthening their connection with Allah (SWT).

Friends.title: Prayer Circle & Friends
Friends.description: Connect with friends, share prayer achievements, and motivate each other in your spiritual journey. Build a supportive community that helps everyone stay consistent in their prayers.

Awards.title: Special Prayer Awards
Awards.description: Unlock exclusive awards and achievements that recognize your dedication to prayer. Track your progress and celebrate your spiritual milestones.

Widgets.title: Custom Prayer Widgets
Widgets.description: Beautiful, customizable widgets for your home screen to keep track of prayer times and your daily spiritual goals.

Analytics.title: Detailed Prayer Analytics
Analytics.description: Get insights into your prayer habits with detailed statistics, trends, and personalized recommendations to improve your consistency.

Reminders.title: Smart Prayer Reminders
Reminders.description: Personalized, location-aware prayer notifications that adapt to your schedule and help you never miss a prayer.

Themes.title: Beautiful Themes
Themes.description: Choose from a variety of beautiful, carefully crafted themes to personalize your prayer tracking experience.

Support.title: Priority Support
Support.description: Get priority access to our support team and be the first to try new features as they're released.

Pro.AutoRenew: Subscription will automatically renew. Cancel anytime.
Pro.ErrorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.
Pro.RestoreSuccess: Your pro features have been restored!
Pro.Future: And more features coming soon, In sha Allah
Pro.TeamMessage: Alhamdulillah, this project is built and maintained with dedication and love. We strive to help you maintain your prayers and grow spiritually, seeking Allah's pleasure in every feature we create.
Pro.BismillahMessage: Bismillah, let's begin this blessed journey together

Freemium.Title: Prayer Tracker +
Freemium.Description: Enjoy enhanced features to support your prayer journey â€” track progress, stay consistent, and connect with your circle.
Freemium.UpgradePrompt: Access this feature to enhance your experience

Account.Title: Account
Account.DeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
Account.DeleteMessage: This action is irreversible, and we will be sad to see you go. All your data will be permanently deleted.

Agreement.Title: Agreement to Terms
Agreement.Content: By using the Pray Tracker app, you agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use the app.

Usage.Title: Acceptable Use
Usage.Content: You agree to use Pray Tracker only for its intended purpose â€” helping you track and manage your daily prayers. You may not use the app in a way that harms the app, its services, or other users.

UserContent.Title: User Content
UserContent.Content: Your submitted data, including prayer records and profile information, remains your property. We only use this data to operate and improve the app experience.

Termination.Title: Account Termination
Termination.Content: You may delete your account at any time from the app settings. We reserve the right to suspend or remove accounts that violate these Terms.

Changes.Title: Changes to Terms
Changes.Content: We may update these Terms occasionally. If changes are significant, weâ€™ll notify you in the app. Continued use of the app means you accept the updated Terms.

Contact.Title: Contact Us
Contact.Content: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms, please email us at salahbm.dev@gmail.com

DataCollection.Title: Information We Collect
DataCollection.Content: We collect only the information necessary to provide our services: your name, surname, username, email address, profile image, password, and prayer tracking data.

DataUse.Title: How We Use Your Information
DataUse.Content: Your information is used solely to enable core app features, such as tracking prayers and managing your profile. We do not use your data for advertising or share it with third parties.

DataSharing.Title: Information Sharing
DataSharing.Content: We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties. All your information stays within Pray Tracker and is used only to support your experience in the app.

Security.Title: Data Security
Security.Content: We use industry-standard methods to protect your personal data. While no system is completely secure, we take reasonable steps to keep your information safe.

UserControl.Title: Your Choices
UserControl.Content: You have full control over your data. You can update or delete your account and personal information at any time through the app settings.

Changes.Title: Changes to Privacy Policy
Changes.Content: If we make any changes to this policy, we will let you know in the app. Continued use of Pray Tracker after updates means you accept the new policy.

Contact.Title: Contact Us
Contact.Content: For any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please email us at salahbm.dev@gmail.com

Mission.Title: Our Mission
Mission.Description: Pray Tracker is dedicated to helping Muslims maintain their daily prayers, track their spiritual journey, and build a stronger connection with Allah. Our goal is to make prayer tracking simple, meaningful, and rewarding.

Credits.Title: Credits
Credits.Description: Developed with love and dedication by the Pray Tracker team. Special thanks to our community for their continuous support and feedback.
